name: Meteor Shower (itch) (Azee)
description:
Meteor Shower is a simple 3D game where you try to defend the planet from the meteors falling from the sky. 

The game is available for Android and Windows, but it is highly recommended to play it on Android as it allows the player to use the "Gyroscope" to aim at the meteors, and provides the best experience possible.

Available Platforms: Android, Windows
Recommended Platform: Android

Developed for Weekly Game Jam #135
